author: matzew
msg: commented the archetype out, for now

author: rott
msg: CTS update.  Followup:  removing unnecessary class and files.

author: rott
msg: CTS update.  The CTS requires that we honor property scopes
(APPLICATION vs. HANDLER), and that the properties on the
request context and response context be available to the
client application.  This required wrapping these two contexts
with another (MEPContext), adding tests, and changing
method signatures and calls in many places.

author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-1504.  Fix terminate-hadoop-cluster in contrib/ec2 to only terminate Hadoop instances, and not other instances started by the same user.  Contributed by Tom White.
